root.name: Legends of Wrestling II
root.description: OverviewReleased in 2002, Legends of Wrestling II was once again published by Acclaim Entertainment and came out on the Playstation 2, XBOX, Nintendo Gamecube and the Game Boy Advance.The game featured all the wrestlers featured within the original game apart from Rob Van Dam who had signed a contract with the WWE and so was unable to take part and also over 20 new superstars. Once again the aim of the game was to fight your way through the various wrestling territories on your way to championship gold.Â CharactersThe new superstars featured were: Eddie Guerrero Andre the GiantBig John StuddThe British BulldogBobby Heenan Owen Hart Roddy PiperRick and Scott - The Steiner BrothersRocky JohnsonSid ViciousThe Grand Wizard Bam Bam BigelowAndy KaufmanAbdullah the ButcherBaron von RaschkeBob BacklundKnobbs and Saggs - The Nasty BoysSteve WilliamsJim DugganKiller KowalskiPaul OrndorffMil MascarasBruno SammartinoThe European version of the game also featured the following exclusive British Wrestlers:Big DaddyGiant HaystacksKendo NagasakiMick McManusGame ModesExhibitionCareerCreateTournamentShopTheatreMatch Types:Singles 1 vs 1Tag Team 2 vs 2, 3 vs 3, 4 vs 4 (tag matches can be made into elimination matches)3 way dance (3 person elimination match)4 way dance (4 person elimination match)Ladder MatchCage MatchBattle Royal
